title: #246: How To Fix A Drug Scandal, Part 2
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa are joined one final time by Director and Producer Erin Lee Carr and criminal defence attorney, Luke Ryan.

We discuss how two chemists can have such a profound impact on so many people in the criminal justice system and who is ultimately accountable.

You won't want to miss it.
